channel.title: How to run runescape private server on Vps?
channel.description: Hey everyone,Firstly i hadn't been on moparscape for over a year..i did use to host many runescape private servers back in the day on my computer.I have now bought a ubuntu vps I was wondering if anyone can tell me how to run the server on it. I have downloaded my server..the run.bat opens as txt which i can edit...or can you post a link to where it gives a guide..i have tried the search bar had no luck tho

item.title: How to run runescape private server on Vps?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

This has been asked and answered more times than I care to count. Do a little bit of research please.

I will tell you that batch files are for MS/DOS not Linux. You will instead have to write a shell script (no extension required but .sh is customary)

Ex. (run.sh for a PI source)

"/root/jdk1.6.0_34/bin/java" -Xmx1024m -cp bin:deps/poi.jar:deps/mysql.jar:deps/mina.jar:deps/slf4j.jar:deps/slf4j-nop.jar:deps/jython.jar:log4j-1.2.15.jar: server.Server

Read full topic
item.source: How to run runescape private server on Vps?
